property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. A creature equipped with this can't be attacked. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you put a dragon in the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Humans or fire Dragons attack, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise put it on the bottom of your deck. Dragsolution—When you put a Dragon in the battle zone, if it's not the first Dragon put into the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution Humans and non-evolution Dragons into the battle zone. If all cards are Dragons, each of your creatures gets 'speed attacker'. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Triple breaker Dragon Evade

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this would be destroyed, you may add a shield to your hand instead. (You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.) Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or less shields, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a light creature would leave the battle zone, you may put a shield into your hand instead. (You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.) Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have 1 Shield or less, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

card.name: Leo the World, Zenith Heavenly Saint

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Triple breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have no shields, it stays in the battle zone instead. When you would lose the game or your opponent would win the game, you may destroy one of your non-dragheart creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. (You may use 'shield trigger' ability of a shield added put into your hand in this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if one of your opponent's creatures was destroyed, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your darkness creatures attacks, you may destroy one of your other creatures. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. Dragsolution—When one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your creatures. For each creature destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Triple breaker Dragon Evade—When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this is your only creature in the battle zone, flip it to the dragheart fortress side instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, each of your opponent's creatures gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this dragheart into the battle zone or whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may put a nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 20 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you summon a creature from your hand, you may put a Nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 30 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon a creature from your hand, or whenever this creature attacks, you may put a nature creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a nature dragheart that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or more creatures in the battle zone, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your light creatures attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 4 or more creatures in the battle zone, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

card.name: Soleil Noir, Solar Eclipse Dragon Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand or graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When you put a creature into the battle zone that costs 3 or less, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, your opponent puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. If you do, put it into its owner's graveyard after casting it. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in his graveyard, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your water creatures attacks, your opponent puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if your opponent has 10 or more cards in his graveyard, You may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. If you do, put it into its owner's graveyard after casting it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell from a players graveyard for no cost. If you do, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the creature equipped with this attacks, you may draw a card. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if the creature equipped with this is tapped, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your water creatures attacks, you may draw a card. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand, you may flip this to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your creatures attack, you may draw a card. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone and draw 2 cards instead. If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +4000 power and 'double breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragsolution—When a creature equipped with this would be destroyed, flip this to the dragheart fortress side instead. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Dragsolution|When one of your Darkness creatures is destroyed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature would be destroyed, you may put 4 cards in your graveyard on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if your opponent has less creatures in the battle zone than you do, flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have more creatures in the battle zone than your opponent, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Human, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if the equipped creature is tapped, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your nature creatures attacks, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have 12 or more cards in your mana zone, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's cards that cost 4 or less in the battle zone and put it to its owner's mana zone.
